title: Create an infrastructure & peripheral asset record
content:
You can create an infrastructure & peripheral asset record with the following methods:

Method 1: create a new infrastructure & peripheral asset record

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Service Asset & Configuration

  2. From SACM Home, select Infrastructure & Peripherals.

  3. Click New.

  4. In the New Infrastructure & Peripheral Asset dialog box, provide all requested information. This dialog requests values for the basic infrastructure & peripheral asset attributes.

    Field Description
    Display label External (common) name of the asset.
    Subtype A level of categorization of the asset.
    Model The asset model. For example, Monitors.
    Owner

    The person who manages or monitors the asset.
    Asset tag

    Physical assets have physical tags attached with a unique identifier.
    Location

    Physical location of a physical asset. The only stockrooms available for selection are those that are operational (A stockroom is operational when it's in the Operational phase of the workflow.).

    When the asset is in the In stock phase, this value is read-only, and is automatically populated with the location of the selected stockroom.
    Serial number

    The manufacturer's assigned serial number or unique ID.
    Select phase The phase that the asset is currently in.

  5. Click Save.

Method 2: duplicate an existing infrastructure & peripheral asset record

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Service Asset & Configuration.
  2. From SACM Home, select Infrastructure & Peripherals.
  3. Select the record you want to duplicate.
  4. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.
  5. Click Duplicate on the toolbar. The New Infrastructure & Peripheral form is displayed.
  6. Make any required edits to the new record, and click Save.

When you duplicate an infrastructure & peripheral asset record, the values of all the fields of the existing record are copied to the matching fields in the new form. Exception: the following fields in the new form are not populated when you duplicate an infrastructure & peripheral asset record.

  • All associations (fields of the logical type Many2Many)
  • Asset tag
  • Attachments
  • Barcode
  • Comments
  • Global ID
  • Id
  • Serial number
